oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Report of Separation from the Armed Forces of the United State
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Pvt. Jeff Glynn Montgomery enlisted on October 21, 1918 at Memphis, Tennessee and reported to Parris Island, South Carolina on October 21, 1918, barely three weeks before the armistice. He was discharged in April 1919. This is his Report of Seperation (DD 214) and a letter from Capt. H. W. Goeller, of the Army Reserve. It is on Tennessee Office of the Adjutant General stationery.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
